DOC.brief_summary: Objectives : This study aim assess effectiveness , safety , feasibility intensive acupuncture treatment combine standard antiemetic medication compare P6 acupoint stimulation combine standard antiemetic medication standard antiemetic medication alone , prevent postoperative nausea vomiting ( PONV ) patient undergo laparoscopic colorectal surgery . Background : PONV one prevalent discomforts early phase recovery surgery . Evidence suggest stimulation P6 acupuncture point reduce occurrence PONV . What remain unclear whether high dose acupuncture produce benefit compare P6 stimulation alone whether acupuncture combine standard antiemetic medication yield well outcomes . This study aim assess effectiveness safety different acupuncture regimen prevention PONV : high-dose acupuncture treatment combine standard antiemetic medication , P6 acupuncture-point stimulation combine standard antiemetic medication , medication alone .
DOC.brief_title: Acupuncture Postoperative Nausea Vomiting Patients Undergoing Colorectal Surgery
DOC.criteria: Patients undergo elective laparoscopic surgery colorectal cancer resection ( right hemicolectomy , leave hemicolectomy , anterior resection primary anastomosis , low anterior resection loop ileostomy fecal diversion ) Patients age 18 80 American Society Anesthesiologists Grade 1 2 Written inform consent Pregnancy Inflammatory bowel disease Comorbidities may affect outcome surgery ( e.g. , chronic kidney disease , chronic liver disease , cardiopulmonary failure , diabetes complication ) Use emetogenic / antiemetic medication within 24 hour surgery Previous history emetic episode administration antibiotic Expected use mechanical ventilation Cognitive impairment may affect patient 's ability complete outcome assessment Previous history stroke Previous history sensitive reaction acupuncture Patients unable cooperate acupuncture treatment Pacemaker implantation Previous history epilepsy Patients received Korean medicine treatment ( acupuncture , moxibustion , cup , herbal medicine ) within 2 week Patients participate trial within 3 month
